function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited access to financial support during Covid-19","Impact":"Financial strain and potential business closure","Mitigation":"Seek alternative funding sources and financial assistance programs","Technologies":"Online financial platforms, crowdfunding, digital banking","People":"Service SMEs","Owner":"Service SME owners and management"},{"Description":"Reliance on personal networks for financial support","Impact":"Increased personal financial risk and potential strain on personal relationships","Mitigation":"Create diversified financial support networks and seek professional financial advice","Technologies":"Financial management software, online investment platforms","People":"Owners and close kin of service SMEs","Owner":"Service SME owners and financial advisors"},{"Description":"Dependency on external networks for technical knowledge","Impact":"Inadequate technical knowledge and potential service quality issues","Mitigation":"Invest in team training, establish technical partnerships, and utilize online learning platforms","Technologies":"E-learning platforms, technical collaboration tools","People":"Team members of service SMEs","Owner":"Service SME owners and technical trainers"}]}
